title: Monopoly facing loss on graph should exit in LR

content.question: The profit-maximizing firm depicted in the graph above should

choices.label: exit if conditions do not improve in the long run
produce the output that minimizes average total cost
use less capital and more labor to reduce cost

content.answer: exit if conditions do not improve in the long run
